message: This is a low-quality product, but I'm willing to let it go for $10000. I'm doing you a favor by selling it to you at this price. If you're not interested, I'll just have to sell it to someone else.

Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the bonus, but I'm still not interested in a product I know is low-quality. I'm looking for high-quality items, and I'll pass on this one.
